column1: Kata Robata////There is two dishes in particular that my husband and I love. 1st is the Miso Eggplant with Garlic Sushi Rice. Please do yourself a favor and order this dish. The rice was crispy and fragrant
column2: the eggplant was deliciously topped with miso sauce that perfectly rounded off the dish. Second is the Texas Kobe Beef Skewers. WOW
column3: these melt in your mouth and are so juicy. The quality of the meat is top notch.
